question.text:
Match the following.
 
Column I Column II
(P) Flora (I) Information for identification of names of species found in an area.
(Q) Manuals (II) Provides an index to plants species found in an area
(R) Monograph (III) Information of one taxon
  (IV) Contains an actual account of habitat and distribution of plants of a given area.

<math><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>-</mo><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Q</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>-</mo><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>-</mo><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi></mrow></mfenced></math>

<math><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>-</mo><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Q</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>-</mo><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi></mrow></mfenced><mo>-</mo><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi></mrow></mfenced></math>

solution.text: Taxonomy is study of identification and classification of organisms. Taxonomic aids help to store and preserve these organisms. These aids are Herbarium, Botanical gardens, Museum, Zoological parks and keys, Manuals, Monograph, Flora and Catalogues. Flora means information of distribution of plants in a given area. Manuals have information for identification of names of species found in an area. Monographs have taxon information.
